Stormtrooper Helmet

Star Wars Episodio VII

The First Order can only operate effectively with the absolute loyalty of its followers. Should any soldier be found guilty of treason, it is up to this special branch of Stormtroopers to dispense final justice.

ANOVOS is proud to offer the STAR WARS™ THE LAST JEDI First Order Stormtrooper Executioner Helmet Accessory. Items are subject to change in availability and features. This is not a toy. Not suitable for children. Does not offer protection
